tool.name: rnazSort.pl
tool.help:
Usage: rnazSort.pl [options] key [file]
Options: -r, --reverse Sort in reverse order.
--no-loci Do not preserve the locus grouping but simply sort the windows.
-v, --version Prints version information and exits.
-h, --help Prints a short help message and exits.
--man Prints a detailed manual page and exits.
